description:
Hayato`s 4th grade class returns from spring break to find they have a strange new homeroom teacher. What chaos and hijinks will ensue? Meanwhile, two adventurers embark on an epic quest in a parallel fantasy universe.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: And His Name Is Pascal-Sensei / Perfect Plate
Sono Na wa Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate
その名もパスカル先生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート
